short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Post2Sheet allows you to track new Facebook group post data into Google Sheet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gather your Facebook group content into Google Sheet without coding.

HOW TO USE:

#1. Go over to your group, turn on post approvals.

#2. Install Post2Sheet Chrome extension, connect a copy of the provided Google sheet format.

#3. Review all pending posts within your connect group. Approving them makes their data appear on the Google sheet.

Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated with Facebook in any way.
